About Me

let me tell you a few things about my self....

BIO

My name is Ndubuisi Divine. I am a former student of Faith Academy, I Love programming and robotics and i have always wanted to be a software engineer, for the past a year and some months, so i started to learn programming on my own. I am about to enter Babcock University and i hope that after this experience in the university, i will have enough knowlodge to push forward.

King Jesus Web and online entrepreneur

FullStack Developer and online business adviser

I have a dream that i will have my own company that will help produce full websites. Also i want to help teach people online marketing.

Frontend Developer, photographer and photo editor

I also wanted to help in the make web designs and own a photography studio and editing company.

King Jesus Database and artificial intelligence

Backend Developer and AI agent

I wanted to make a Database management company. On doing so i wanted to also make a robotics and artifitial intelligence company to make life easier for us as human beings.
